Name: Betsy Ross
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Deep burgundy red and boozy. Based on the classic combination of port and brandy, this is a drink to finish a night. (Benefits from some dilution so stir well.)
History: This combination of brandy, port and curaçao is also known as the Imperial, indeed it first appears under that name in William "Cocktail Bill" Boothby 's posthumously published 1934 World's Drinks And How To Mix Them .
Nutrition: One serving of Betsy Ross contains 180 calories
